alert.note: Alert for Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 9:06PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western McPherson, northwestern Reno, Rice and Saline Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 905 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Tescott to near Lorraine to 6 miles northwest of Seward. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salina, Lyons, Lindsborg, Sterling, Nickerson, Marquette, Little River, Assaria, Brookville, Smolan, Alden, Windom, New Cambria, Raymond, Falun, Glendale, and Salina Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 77 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 236 and 264. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
